comments.text: Easy to get a taxi here, ask fore hotel mame cumba bang, fee around 1000 cfa. Got picked up easily, said amuma halls (no money in wolof). No problem, I'm at the beach! There is a cool reserve with a ton of monkeys further along the road.

Easy to get a taxi here, ask fore hotel mame combat bang, fee around 1000 cfa. Got picked up easily, said amuma halls (no money in wolof). No problem, I'm at the beach! There is a cool reserve with a ton of monkeys further along the road.
Wandering along the road, picked up by a senegalese businessman who spoke pefect English and took me to Dakar.
Several taxis stopped, all wanted payment, but eventually a private car came along and took me to the town. Passed by multiple European overlaners from the zebra bar, none stopped.
You can explain how you are traveling to the policemen. They helped me to find a car. Not very efficient but friendly.
